title: Eliminate Distractions:
body: In our chaotic and fast-paced world, the pursuit of inner peace and tranquility has become more important than ever. Zen, a philosophy rooted in mindfulness and simplicity, offers a path to find that elusive harmony within ourselves.

Because they make up everything!

title: zzzzzzzzzzTwisterApp
body:
Three fun facts:
1. Honey never spoils: Archaeologists found edible honey in 3,000-year-old tombs!
2. Bananas are berries; strawberries aren't true berries.
3. Cleopatra lived closer to the moon landing than the construction of the pyramids.
